description: management of OS templates in Proxmox VE cluster

node.description: Proxmox VE node, when you will operate with template

src.description: path to uploaded file required only for C(state=present)

force.description: can be used only with C(state=present), exists template will be overwritten

api_host.description: the host of the Proxmox VE cluster

api_password.description: the password to authenticate with you can use PROXMOX_PASSWORD environment variable

state.description: Indicate desired state of the template

content_type.description: content type required only for C(state=present)

template.description: the template name required only for states C(absent), C(info)
